segments.text: I'm just watching this scene unfold, and it's quite something.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kitchen is a bit of a mess, but not in the usual way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Look at the sink; it's completely overflowing, water pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she not notice that huge puddle forming around her feet?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her dress hem must be soaking wet already.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's so focused on polishing that plate, utterly absorbed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see her foot already in the water, yet no reaction at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This is an accident waiting to happen; someone is definitely going to slip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor will be incredibly slippery with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a wonder the drain isn't taking anything away, the faucet is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope she looks down soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The wooden cabinets are going to be ruined by all this moisture.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems completely unaware of the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR
